name: Lady Popular Fashion Dress Up Star Girl Beauty Game
name_original: Lady Popular Fashion Dress Up Star Girl Beauty Game
description:
Lady Popular Fashion Dress Up Star Girl Beauty Game

The most fashionable game has arrived; Girls Party Dress Up!

Do you have what it takes to make it in the fast-paced fashion world? Start creating the trendiest looks, put on a fierce face, and climb to supermodel stardom!

So you wanna be a stylist? Take the first step with Fashion Party Dress Up.

Feature Highlights:
- 200+ items for you to challenge your matching skills
- Real and cute game
- Easy-to-use, kid-friendly interface with incredible creative possibilities
- Take a photo and share it with your friends via Facebook or Email
- No rules, stress or time limits – play in any way you like
- safe for all ages.

Thanks for playing and please leave a review to keep free update coming!
Your support is greatly appreciated!

What are you waiting for? Just play!
